alert.note: Alert for Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 4:15PM EST until January 09 at 7:15PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN SURRY, WILKES AND YADKIN COUNTIES... At 415 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain was decreasing across the warned area. Between 2.5 and 4 inches of rain have fallen since early this morning, resulting in localized flash flooding. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area through 5 pm. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... North Wilkesboro... Elkin... Wilkesboro... Fairview... Yadkinville... Jonesville... Dobson... This includes the following streams and drainages... Ararat River, Beaverdam Creek, Arnold Branch, Beaver Creek, Big Bugaboo Creek, Basin Creek and Bee Tree Branch. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
